levelList.name: Proof of Loyalty
levelList.desc: [StartBattle] This Skill gains 1 'Offense Level' by (Highest A-Reson./3) (Max 4)

levelList.name: Proof of Loyalty
levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] This Skill gains 1 'Offense Level' by (highest A-Reson./3) (Max 4)
If the highest A-Reson is Envy A-Reson, Gain 50% additional 'Offense Level' to the 'Offense Level' gained by the above effect (rounded down)

levelList.name: Proof of Loyalty
levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] This Skill gains 1 'Offense Level' by (highest A-Reson./2) (Max 6)
If the highest A-Reson is Envy A-Reson., boost the 'Offense Level' gained by the above effect by 50% (rounded down)
Gain double the 'Offense Level' from the above effects in Focused Encounters with 7 or fewer Participant Limits.

levelList.name: A Just Vengeance

If the highest A-Reson is Envy A-Reson, Gain 50% additional ''Offense Level'' to the ''Offense Level'' gained by the above effect (rounded down)

coindescs.desc: [EndSkill] If target is defeated, 1 ally with the least SP heals 6 SP

levelList.name: Multifold Retribution
levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] If at 6+ Envy A-Reson including this Skill, use 'A Just Vengeance' as Counter.
Upon activating the above effect, the Skill's affinity is changed to Envy.
(Leftmost 'Multifold Retribution' is activated first. Activates 2 times per turn)

levelList.name: I Command Thee, Halt!
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] If the target has 6+ [Vibration], Clash Power +1
[WhenUse] Consume 10 [Vibration] Count on self to gain Coin Power +2

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] If the target has 10+ [Vibration], consume 10 [Vibration] on target and inflict 2 [TimeSuspend]
- If this unit is in a [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] state, this effect does not consume the target's [Vibration]
[OnSucceedAttack] If the target's Speed is slower than this unit's, trigger [Switch_Vibration] into [VibrationChainPersonality]

levelList.name: I Shall Summon the Time
levelList.desc:

[WhenUse] For this turn: when hit by an enemy, inflict 2 [Vibration] on target next turn (2 times per turn)

levelList.name: I Shall Summon the Time
